com.musicplayer.scanner

Class FolderScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.musicplayer.scanner.FolderScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scanner

    public class FolderScanner
extends java.lang.Object
implements Scanner
    Get stuff to play by scanning a folder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FolderScanner(java.lang.String path)
      Create the folder scanner, and run the preliminary scan on the folder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAlbumName()
      return the last folder name (without /) of the path to use as album name.

      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getCoverArt()
